SEARCH
Package medicalrecord

Class MedicalRecordManager

java.lang.Object
medicalrecord.MedicalRecordManager
public class MedicalRecordManager extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the medical records of patients. It handles loading, updating, retrieving, and displaying medical records. Additionally, it manages the inventory updates when a prescription is dispensed.

This class interacts with CSV files to persist medical records and inventory updates.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecordManager

      public MedicalRecordManager()

  • Method Details

    • setFilePaths

      public static void setFilePaths()
      Updates the file paths for loading and saving medical record data by retrieving them from the SystemInitialisation class.

      This method centralizes the file path management, ensuring that the file paths are dynamically retrieved rather than hardcoded, improving maintainability and flexibility.

      File paths updated:

      • originalPath: Path to the original CSV file containing admin data.
      • updatedPath: Path to the updated CSV file for saving admin data.
      See Also:
      • SystemInitialisation.getFilePath(String)

    • loadMedicalRecords

      public static void loadMedicalRecords(boolean isFirstRun)
      Loads the medical records from a CSV file. Depending on whether it is the first run or not, it loads either from the original or updated file.
      Parameters:
      isFirstRun - true if the application is running for the first time; false otherwise.

    • getMedicalRecordsByPatient

      public static List<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecordsByPatient(String patientID)
      Gets all medical records associated with a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose medical records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of medical records associated with the patient.

    • findMedicalRecordbyID

      public static MedicalRecord findMedicalRecordbyID(String medicalRID)
      Finds a medical record by its unique medical record ID.
      Parameters:
      medicalRID - the unique medical record ID.
      Returns:
      the medical record associated with the ID, or null if not found.

    • getMedicalRecord

      public static MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord(String doctorID, String patientID)
      Gets the medical record associated with a specific doctor and patient.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor.
      patientID - the ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      the medical record for the specified doctor and patient, or null if not found.

    • getMedicalRecords

      public static List<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecords(String doctorID, String patientID)
      Gets all medical records associated with a specific doctor and patient.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor.
      patientID - the ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      a list of medical records associated with the doctor and patient.

    • getMedicalRecords

      public static List<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecords()
      Gets the list of all medical records.
      Returns:
      a list of all medical records.

    • displayMedicalRecords

      public static void displayMedicalRecords()
      Displays all medical records currently loaded.

    • displayPendingMR

      public static void displayPendingMR()
      Displays all pending medical records (those with a prescription status of PENDING).

    • displayDispensedMR

      public static void displayDispensedMR()
      Displays all dispensed medical records (those with a prescription status of DISPENSED).

    • updateMRStatus

      public static void updateMRStatus(MedicalRecord record)
      Updates the prescription status of a medical record to DISPENSED and adjusts the inventory. If the prescription status is already PENDING, the method will attempt to deduct the prescribed medicines from the inventory and update the record's status.
      Parameters:
      record - the medical record to update.

    • duplicateMedicalRecord

      public static void duplicateMedicalRecord()
      Duplicates the current medical record list into the updated CSV file.

    • addMedicalRecord

      public static void addMedicalRecord(MedicalRecord record)
      Adds a new medical record to the list and updates the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      record - the medical record to add.

    • removeMedicalRecord

      public static void removeMedicalRecord(String doctorID, String patientID)
      Removes a medical record from the list based on the doctor ID and patient ID. If the record is found, it will be deleted and the updated list will be saved.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor.
      patientID - the ID of the patient.
